title.value: Хозяйственно-биологическая характеристика и технология возделывания сорта озимой тетраплоидной ржи Белая Вежа
Economic and biological characteristics and cultivation technology of tetraploid winter rye cultivar Belaya Vezha

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Chugaeva, V.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming
Rybak, A.R., Grodno Zonal Institute of Plant Growing, Shchuchin (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the competitive variety trial there was tested tetraploid winter rye (Secale cereale) variety Belaya Vezha. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in the Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming on sod-podzolic light loamy soil in 2009-2011. The analysis of the economic and biological characteristics of the variety was carried out. As a result of realized research there was offered the recommendations for variety cultivation technology. Variety Belaya Vezha was recommended for cultivation in the Vitebsk region in compliance with the requirements established by the regulations for the industry rye varieties with a dominant type of short stem. The seeding rate based on long-term research was 4.0-4.5 mln/ha of seeds germinating. The optimum data of sowing varieties of Belaya Vezha in the Vitebsk region - August 25 - September 10 was given. It was revealed that the maximum yield of variety Belaya Vezha (58.1 t/ha) was obtained on the background of nitrogen application of120 kg/ha of active substance fractionally (60 + 30 + 30) in the fertilizer with the use of fungicide and retardant.
